name: Passage's Languid Lifestyle
description: This upholstered chair with a luxurious gold frame is a common sight in food establishments like the Caf√© Lutece in the Vasari Passage. It is said to be one of Fontaine's first chair designs to utilize the concept of "ergonomics." It is specifically designed to alleviate strain on the back and neck, providing the users with a comfortable and relaxing sitting experience. However, it is not as comfortable for Melusines as it is for everyone else. Achieving optimal sitting posture for Melusines requires further study of "ergonomics" and designing a chair with adjustable backrest, headrest, and seat height. Developing such a specialized chair can be quite costly...
